movie.title: Predestination
movie.writer: Michael Spierig, Peter Spierig, Robert A. Heinlein (story)
movie.actors: Ethan Hawke, Sarah Snook, Christopher Kirby, Christopher Sommers
movie.plot: PREDESTINATION chronicles the life of a Temporal Agent sent on an intricate series of time-travel journeys designed to ensure the continuation of his law enforcement career for all eternity. Now, on his final assignment, the Agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Fun genre fare with uncommon intelligence, Predestination serves as a better-than-average sci-fi adventure -- and offers a starmaking turn from Sarah Snook.
